meanings.definition: Prepare written material for publication by correcting, condensing, or otherwise modifying it.
meanings.sent1: I need to copyedit my essay before submitting it to my teacher.
meanings.sent2: The editor will copyedit the article to ensure it is error-free.
meanings.sent3: After I copyedit my story, it will be ready for the school newspaper.
meanings.sent4: She carefully copyedited the manuscript, making sure every detail was perfect.
meanings.sent5: The author spent hours copyediting his novel to make it polished and professional.
